text: The 2017 European Junior Badminton Championships were held at the Centre Sportif Regional d'Alsace in Mulhouse, France, between 7 April - 16 April 2017. ==Medalists== {| |- |rowspan=2|Boys' singles | rowspan=2 | Toma Junior Popov | rowspan=2 | Arnaud Merkle | David Jones |- | Joran Kweekel |- | rowspan=2 |Girls' singles | rowspan=2 | Julie Dawall Jakobsen | rowspan=2 | Maryna Ilyinskaya | Yvonne Li |- | Irina Amalie Andersen |- | rowspan=2 |Boys' doubles | rowspan=2 | Thom Gicquel Toma Junior Popov | rowspan=2 | Max Flynn Callum Hemming | Daniel Lundgaard Jesper Toft |- | Robert Cybulski Paweł Śmiłowski |- | rowspan=2 |Girls' doubles | rowspan=2 | Emma Karlsson Johanna Magnusson | rowspan=2 | Alexandra Bøje Julie Dawall Jakobsen | Amalie Magelund Freja Ravn |- | Wiktoria Dabczynska Aleksandra Goszczynska |- | rowspan=2 | Mixed doubles | rowspan=2 | Rodion Alimov Alina Davletova | rowspan=2 | Alexander Dunn Eleanor O'Donnell | Paweł Śmiłowski Magdalena Świerczyńska |- | Miha Ivanič Nika Arih |- | rowspan=2 |Teams | rowspan=2 | | rowspan=2 | | |- | |} ==Medal table== ==References== Category:European Junior Badminton Championships European Junior Badminton Championships European Junior Badminton Championships European Junior Badminton Championships Category:International sports competitions hosted by France
title: 2017 European Junior Badminton Championships
